name: adventurer
content:

someone who enjoys and looks for dangerous and exciting experiences: He was something of an adventurer, living most of his life abroad.
disapproving a person who takes risks, acts dishonestly, or uses the fact that they are sexually attractive to become rich or powerful: He was portrayed in the press as a gold digger and adventurer.
